meanings.definition: A type of chemotherapy drug used to treat certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed daunomycin to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: Patients often receive daunomycin as part of their cancer treatment.
meanings.sent3: The daunomycin bottle and the cancer cells had a serious showdown.
meanings.sent4: Her body became a battlefield where daunomycin warriors fought cancer invaders.
meanings.sent5: Daunomycin, the cancer-fighting hero, entered the bloodstream ready for battle.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a specific medication used in cancer treatment.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist explained the benefits of daunomycin for cancer patients.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often discuss the effectiveness of daunomycin in treating cancer.
meanings.sent3: The daunomycin label made the other medications jealous of its cancer-fighting powers.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cancer treatment, daunomycin stood out like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: Every drop of daunomycin was like a tiny soldier fighting against cancer cells.
